attributes.action: Hold a Referendum to Rejoin The European Union
attributes.additional_details: Because brexit has been a catastrophe as well as the rights of those who wanted to remain in the EU have been taken away.
attributes.background: To hold a Second European Union Referendum to allow Britain to Rejoin the European Union.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

The UK government should apply via Article 49 to rejoin the EU
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552263
